text: Had a lovely time here with my dog! The indoor pet-friendly setup is super cozy, and the breakfast and steak were both really tasty. Loved that they have a dedicated dog run area too‚Äîmy pup had a blast! Great spot for a chill meal with your furry friend.

It is a pet friendly cafe. I was able to see dogs getting sent for grooming and for their playtime. The food was decent and the drinks were good. I liked the vibes from this place as there was nothing too fancy. The staff were amazing though very polite and friendly. If you own a dog and your nearby do try visit this cafe.

Absolutely love OMD Cafe & Bar! Not only is it pet-friendly, but the food is also amazing! From pasta to ham & cheese croissants, matcha lattes, and chicken chop‚Äîeverything we tried was delicious. They even serve food for dogs, and my pup Mochi couldn‚Äôt get enough of the Porkalicious! One portion wasn‚Äôt enough!

Great food, a cozy atmosphere, and a perfect spot for pet lovers. Highly recommend and will definitely be back! üêæ

Stumbled upon this place after walking our dogs near East Coast as we were looking for a pet friendly place to grab a bite and drink. Impressed with the standards of food served (really good for a pet cafe!) and service rendered by the ever friendly Ariel and team. End up coming down twice in a row within a week!!

Superb service and ambience with cute furry friends! This restaurant is indoor pet-friendly which makes it so convenient for pet owners. It serves really delicious food too, I especially love their signature cheeseburger!
